mapper.insert: INSERT INTO log (log_seq, client_ip, local_logtime, log_status, member_id, name) VALUES (log_sequence.nextval, #{client_ip, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{local_logtime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{log_status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{member_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM log ORDER BY log_seq DESC

SELECT * FROM log
AND name LIKE '%' || #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND member_id LIKE '%' || #{member_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND log_status = #{log_status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND local_logtime >= TO_DATE(#{specific_start_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND local_logtime <= TO_DATE(#{specific_end_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
ORDER BY log_seq DESC
